body.name: MSEVC Neck Fan 4 Turbo 6000mAh Portable Neck Fan 360°Cooling Airflow Bladeless Neck Fan USB Rechargeable with 3 Speeds Adjustment Wearable Personal Fan for Outdoor Travel Indoor - Black
deliveryMessages: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
features: 【New Upgraded Portable Neck Fan】- MSEVC Latest version personal neck fan upgraded the airflow and noise reduction function.The wearable neck fan got more powerful airflow and low-noise which keeps your cooling always.With 6000mAh bartteries and four turbine motor design,it will last longer and provide high-velocity wind.Safer than those before and don't worry about your hair being caught or dust,sweat enter the neck fan.Ideal choice as a companion for working in the hot summer.

【3 Speeds Modes & Hand-Free Design】This hand-free neck fan equipped with 3 adjustable air volume setting(Weak,Natural,Strong).Easy to switch by the independent button.You can switch to two or four turbo motor depend on your needs. Just 36 airflow outlets enough to 360° surrounding cooling air supplied. Ultra-light design 8.74 oz weight and Skin-friendly ABS material,80°~150° adjustment angle range,putting less strain on the neck.Give you the best experience in a quiet and comfortable environment.

【360° Powerful Airflow & Low-Noise】Benifit from Four Turbine Motor and Twin Ducts on each side,MSEVC Bladeless neck fan produce strong wind that is powerful than others.And the noise lower to 25dB.It won't disturb you when studying,working,sporting or traveling etc.

【Long-Lasting Battery Life】Built-in rechargeable 6000mAh batteries, the energy-efficient battery capacity supports the neck fan to work for 4-18 hours(depending on different speeds) Our neck fan is matched with fast charging design that it only takes 2.5 hours to get fully charged for enjoy the strong airflow within a day.

【Perfect Summer Gift & Quality assurance】The personal neck fan will free your hand that you can use it in anywhere,anyplace.Such as kitchen, office, garage, camping, riding etc.It also can be the best gift for your family,friends,and colleagues.Also a nice choice for Father's or Mother's Day gifts.We are responsible for our products and customers.If you have any problems with our product,please contact with us first,we will solve it for you within 24 hours
body.description: WHAT’S INSIDE THE PACKAGE？ MSEVC Personal Portable Neck Fan * 1USB Charging Cable * 1User manual * 1 The novel bladeless neck fan commited to bring you 360° gentle breeze around your neck and free your hands and leave you enjoy the coolness anytime,anywhere.Headphone style design,half-closed air inlet,dustproof and sweatproof.Adjustable shape angle at will.it is wearable throughout your daily lives and and effectively solving the annoyance caused by sultry heat.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MSEVC Neck Fan - Our portable neck fan is your perfect companion in the hot summer for keep you cool High-Velocity Airflow - Four-turbine motor structure design to provides energy-efficient wind speed from 4 air inlets,experience the perfect balance of strong and gentle airflow.Long-Lasting Battery Life - Built-in 6000mAh battery to allowing enjoy up 4-18 hours after fully charged.The battery is made of new low consumption materials,lighter and more durable.3 Speeds Adjustable Setting - Equipped with 3 air volume（weak,natural,strong）adjust appropriate wind speed by pressing the power button repeatedly.Also switch to two or four turbo motor depend on your needs.Comfortable to Wear - Upgraded personal neck fan is unlocked new function for experience better comfortable.The shape angle can be adjusted at will according to your needs.Suitable for children,adult and the elderly.Low-Noise & Dust-Proof - Lower to 25dB will not disturb your experience.The bladeless fan design and half-closed air inlet ensure safe to use without worrying about your hair being caught or dust and sweat entering the fan.

Powerful Turbo Motor Equipped with innovative four turbine motor of this portable neck fan to bring you more cooling experience.Full upgraded design improves the amount of airflows being circulated while make sure natural breeze is directed alongside your neck in a vertical direction. Adjustable Shape Angle The unique design is different from others since it allows 80°~150° adjustment angle range depend on neck's size of user.Increased more possibility and comfortable as well as putting less strain on the neck. 36 Wind Outlets It only takes 36 wind outlets bring you 360° surrounding cooling airflow.Neck Fan uses regular air outlets to effectively disperse the flow direction of the wind while makes your neck,face can clearly feel the cool breeze down quickly.Ergonomics design to personalize your experience.

Long Life Battery We are upgraded more long-lasting and durable for the battery of this neck fan.Focus on bring you all-day cool just in one charge,no need to worry about insufficient.6000mAh enough to be used for up to 4-18 hours depend on different wind speed. Independent Button & USB Cable Independent buttons that make you at your fingertips.Adjust the wind speed or turn off the fan by pressing the button repeatedly also switch to two or four turbo motor depend on your needs.Charging interface uses the most commonly used USB cable(included) you can conveniently charge your personal neck fan anytime,anywhere. Size Information Length:7.8 inchesWidth:2 inchesHeight:8.2 inchesProduct weight:8.74 oz

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This thing works great, keeps my 300+lbs boyfriend cool in hot situations. Chargle lasts a while and the fan really kicks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best invention for cooling!
reviews.reviewText: Love this product! I bought myself and a friend one for Christmas to see if it would help with hot flashes and Wah-La! It's a life saver! It's been great in the winter months and looking forward to using in the hot summer months. A++= service and product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works ok, I am sure there are others on the market that work better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and powerful
reviews.reviewText: My son drives for Amazon and I purchased this as a gift to help keep him cool on hot summer days. He loves it! It's lightweight and quiet but surprisingly powerful. Definitely does the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek Neck Fan
reviews.reviewText: Great little fan. It hugs snug to ur neck to stay in place but not too tight to be bothersome. Send a great lil burst of air upwards around the face and head. Perfect for those hot summer ball games.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This item worked great and did what it was supposed to do for about 4 hours which was impressive then it died. After attempting to charge it with every available wire in the house we came to the conclusion that the little fan was no more. It did work great for a bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best white elephant gift
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these neck face for myself and love them. I was going to a Christmas party with a white elephant exchange. They were the hit of the game everyone kept stealing them from everyone else. This neck fan is foldable which is convenient to put in a tote bag or large purse. Battery is decent. I run it on low so the battery lasts longer. Great for amusement parks, baseball games.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great neck fan but not great enough
reviews.reviewText: It does woke; there’s air that comes out at different spots and at different levels but it’s not enough to make a difference when it’s hot out. I used this inside the house when the AC was on but not cooled the house enough & it just didn’t help. I wore it to cook on a warm day and it just didn’t help much. The battery life was incredible! The noise was definitely louder than listed; which made it more obvious you were wearing a fan that’s for sure.
parti en vacance et essayer mes pas contend ne ma pas rafraichi du tout si j avais su j aurais acheter le moins chère

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I decided to purchase this fan as a slightly dearer one thinking it was going to be super duper compared to cheaper ones. But I was disappointed in its performance compared to other one my work colleagues had Even with the full speed running its performance was poor with flow of cool air.I don't think I would recommend it try other one out there.

reviews.reviewTitle: MSEVC Ventilateur tour de cou 4 Turbo 6000 mAh - Ventilateur tour de cou portable à 360 °
reviews.reviewText: Par cette forte chaleur ,pratique léger et rafraîchi très bien bonne autonomie .ce ventilateur de cou fait bien son travail

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: One of the 4 fans started to make an annoying sound, so thought it died on me. But turned out it was 10min before neckfan was out of power, so far its working ok, if you hear strange sounds, recharge it :-)

reviews.reviewTitle: 4個のファンモーターを持つ優等生
reviews.reviewText: 前方左右と後方左右のファン計４個を搭載し、後方２個をスイッチでオンオフできる優れものです。首の後ろ側冷却能力を高めようとするものですが、その効果はあまり高いとは言えない程度なので、こだわれなければ省エネ上前方の２個動作だけで充分実用になると思います。重量は軽く感じるしデザインも良いと思いますが、形状(円形度)が足らないので激しめに動くと首の周りを回転してズレ易いのが唯一ちょっと気になります。
